meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed and unsure if I can keep up in music-related courses
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Robin, a senior in music major. I’ve taken a lot of music courses lately, from improvisation to composition to performance. I’ve really enjoyed them, but I’m also feeling the pressure to show progress and get into a music industry or music education program. My peers are doing well, and I’m starting to feel like I’m falling behind. I don’t know if I can keep up, and I’m worried I’m missing out on a serious career path if I don’t figure this out. I’m interested in talking about how to stay committed and how to graduate strong in my music major.
